page.title: 05A DAY IN THE LIFE OF(cont.d)
page.content: downstairs and she got dressed and had her breakfast. She met Toby and Andrea outside. We all rode to school together. When we arrived we all played Bulldogs with some of our friends. At 9.00 a.m.we went into the classroom , lined up for assembly, sang a hymn and said a prayer.We went back into the classroom and did some Domesday work.At playtime we all played Bulldogs with our friends. We came in from play and carried on with our work. For a snack at playtime Andrea had a packet of salt and vinegar crisps and Sarah had a chocolate bar. At 12.00p.m. we went out to have our dinner. Andrea and Toby both had a school dinner. They had sausage ,beans and chips and for afters Andrea had chocolate crunch and pink sauce but
